name: Cyclamen
description: Cyclamen is a genus of about 20 species of tuberous perennials in the family Primulaceae. Most of them are native to Europe, Mediterranean.These plants have attractive heart-shaped leaves and uniquely shaped, colorful, five-petaled flowers. They are one of the most popular house plants, but in right conditions they will also flourish outdoors. They will fascinate you with their beauty and perfection!
meaning: The name “Cyclamen” comes from the Greek word “kyklos”, which means “circle”, probably because of its shape. Several species are known as “Sowbread” because they are thought to be the favorite food of wild pigs.
color_description: The flowers are usually white, red, rose, purple or pink.
